means: 使熟悉( acquaint的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentence.Network_en: The meetings were a way to get acquainted with each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些会议是一种相互结交的途径。

sentence.Network_en: I am also looking forward to getting more acquainted with immigration law.
sentence.Network_cn: 我也期待能对移民法有更多的了解。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... acquaintanceship 相识 acquainted 有知识的 acquest 取得.
数学英语词汇表[翻译必看] ... ingredient n. 成分, 因素 acquainted adj. 有知识的, 知晓的 synonymous adj. 同义的.
gre词汇表_百度文库 ... acquaintance n. 熟知；熟人 acquainted a. 对某事物熟悉的；对某人认识的 acquiesce v. 勉强同意，默许.
... familiar  adj. 熟悉的；常见的；亲近的 acquainted  adj. 熟识的；知晓的；有知识的 conversant  adj. 熟悉的；精通的；亲近的.

list.abs: 不过这种点头之交（nodding acquaintance）十分重要，因为一旦需要深交，你知道该去哪里找它。很多深交都是这么从初交变成的。
九十 in English, translation,... ... 旧事 former matter;old affair 旧识 former acquaintance;old friend 救世 salvation.
华纳兄弟影片公司电影列表 - 豆丁网 ... 空军 Air Force 老相识 Old Acquaintance 永恒的少女 The Constant Nymph.
英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... worried about （担心） 4 后接介词 acquainted with （对……熟悉） angrywith sb. （对某人生气）.

entry.def: If you are acquainted with something, you know about it because you have learned it or experienced it.

example.ex: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland...
example.tran: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

example.ex: I am also looking forward to getting more acquainted with immigration law.
example.tran: 我也期待能对移民法有更多的了解。

entry.def: If you are acquainted with someone, you have met them and you know them. You can also say that two people are acquainted.

example.ex: No-one personally acquainted with the couple was permitted to talk to the Press...
example.tran: 任何与这对夫妇有私交的人都不准和新闻界谈话。

example.ex: It's true we were acquainted, but no more than that.
example.tran: 我们的确认识，但仅此而已。

entry.def: If you get or become acquainted with someone that you do not know, you talk to each other or do something together so that you get to know each other. You can also say that two people get or become acquainted .

example.ex: The meetings were a way to get acquainted with each other.
example.tran: 这些会议是一种相互结交的途径。

example.ex: ...an opportunity for the leaders to become better acquainted.
example.tran: 增进领导人之间相互了解的机会

auth_sentence.content: She made a point of getting acquainted with Lumumba.
auth_sentence.res_content: She made a point of getting acquainted with Lumumba.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She made a point of getting acquainted with Lumumba.

auth_sentence.content: They've had decades to become acquainted with Livingstone.
auth_sentence.res_content: They've had decades to become acquainted with Livingstone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They've had decades to become acquainted with Livingstone.

auth_sentence.content: His sons...were best acquainted with his tickle impatient humour.
auth_sentence.res_content: His sons...were best acquainted with his tickle impatient humour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His sons...were best acquainted with his tickle impatient humour.

sentences.en: I am acquainted of the facts.
Are you fully acquainted with the facts?
Are you fully acquainted with the latest situation there?
sentences.cn: 你对那儿的最新情况充分了解了吗?

sentences.en: He quickly got acquainted with the new regulations.
sentences.cn: 他很快就熟悉了新规章。

sentences.en: I am acquainted with the names of at least eight such people.
sentences.cn: 我至少已经获知这些人中间八人的名字。

sentences.en: He brought me acquainted with her.
We got acquainted at the conference.
sentences.cn: 我们在那次会议上相识了。

sentences.en: I am not personally acquainted with her.
Are you acquainted with the president of the university?
sentences.cn: 你认识这个大学的校长吗?

sentences.en: I have heard about your friend but I’m not acquainted with him.
sentences.cn: 我听说过你的朋友,但同他不熟。

sentences.en: He was—what is the phrase I’m looking for—not intimately acquainted with his subject.
sentences.cn: 他——我该怎么说呢——对自己的主题很不熟悉。
